updates:
- Action completed
- A unified Peacebuilding and Peace Support Office was approved in GA resolution 80/xxx
- The resolution also decided to "maintain and redeploy the post of ASG for OROLSI as the ASG post in the Office for Mine Action and Police, reporting directly to the USG for Peace Operations and responsible for overseeing the operations of the Civilian Police Division and the UN Mine Action Service and undertaking other functions for the USG"

- Action completed
- Gender units of DPPA and DPO consolidated with reporting line to both USGs, as approved in GA resolution 80/xxx

upcoming_milestone: Proposal on planned joint mechanism linking cross-cutting functions finalized for the Secretary-General's consideration

updates:
- Action completed
- Two ASG posts and offices consolidated, as approved in GA resolution 80/xxx

- Action completed
- Proposal to combine the Western and Northern Africa divisions was rejected in GA resolution 80/xxx

upcoming_milestone: The Secretariat is awaiting a decision by the Security Council regarding the future mandate of UNMHA
updates: - The Secretary-General presented the reviewof UNMHA's mandate and suggested three options to the Security Council on 25 November 2025 (see S/2025/766)

upcoming_milestone: Proposal for integration of UN Office for Central Africa (UNOCA) and the Office of the Special Envoy for the Great Lakes submitted to the relevant intergovernmental bodies
updates:
[Notes from DMSPC]:
This was not included in the Revised Estimates but was included in the SG's Shifting the Paradigm report on Workstream III.  Engagement with the Security Council is required, envisaged for 2026, as per DPPA and DPO submission of the milestones pertaining to work package 22.
